explains: adj. 寒冷的，冬天的；冷淡的

sentences.en: There were gardens and paths and big trees, but everything looked dull and wintry.
sentences.cn: 那里有花园、小路和大树，但一切都显得沉闷而寒冷。

sentences.en: It felt wintry cold that day.
sentences.cn: 那天感觉像冬天一样寒冷。

sentences.en: Wintry weather continues to sweep across Colorado.
sentences.cn: 寒冬气候继续席卷科罗拉多州。
